start: 🎉 The giveaway has started! 🎁 Join now for a chance to win `{{prize}}`!
end: 🎊 The winner of the giveaway is {{winners}}! 🎉 You've won `{{prize}}`! 🎁
pause: ⏸️ The giveaway is paused. Come back soon! ⌛
reStart: 🔄 The giveaway has restarted! 🎁 Join now for a chance to win `{{prize}}`!
noWinners: 😟 Unfortunately, there were no participants in the giveaway. Better luck next time! 🍀
notEnoughParticipants: 😕 Unfortunately, there weren't enough participants to select the winners. Try again soon! 🔄
